New Records: Roston Chase scored 52 runs, Kyle Mayers contributed 35, and Andre Russell scored 15; Obed McCoy's bowling performance was notable
Key Match Events: Rain delay and DLS method reduced the target; Marco Jansen hit a six to win the match; critical wicket partnerships and performances from Chase and Russell
Pre-Game Insights: The match was a virtual quarterfinal; South Africa's strategy with the new ball in power play was effective
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies' disappointment; South Africa's progress in the tournament; Windies' journey ends and await another opportunity
Miscellaneous Highlights: High-stakes match; DLS method used; rain delay impact; teams' standings after the match
